para.text: Version 5.0
Added support for PEST with MODFLOW and SUTRA models.
The user can now customize ModelMuse to specify whether or not a model archive will be created.
Added new function MaxSutraNodeValueInElement
Added the functions ObjectVerticalLength and ObjectVerticalIntersectLength.
Added support for importing Lake for the MODFLOW 6 Lake package from Shapefiles.
In the Rearrange Objects dialog box, it is now possible to specify the order of objects by entering a new position in a new third column in the grid.
ModelMuse can now read concentration files generated by MODFLOW 6.
Added a "Deselect" option to the popup menu in the Show or Hide Objects dialog box.
When contouring a data set in a MODFLOW-LGR model, the user can now choose which models should be contoured on the filter tab of the contour pane of the Data Visualization dialog box.
ModelMuse now checks for MNW2 well screens that are below the bottom of the grid.
Allow the user to choose how to assign gridded data when importing existing MODFLOW models.
Added support for features in RCT package in MT3D-USGS that are not in MT3DMS.
When importing an existing model, imported arrays for transient data now include the stress period as part of the comment.
In the Show or Hide Objects dialog box, double-clicking on a category heading will expand or collapse that category.
Added some error checking when exporting the MAW input file.
When exporting MT3D and MODPATH files, ModelMuse issues an error message if the porosity is less than or equal to zero in any active cell.
The initial dialog box now appears on the taskbar.
Adaptive time stepping in MODFLOW 6 is supported.
Added new functions HGU_HK, HGU_HANI, HGU_VK, HGU_VANI, HGU_SS, HGU_SY, and HGU_KDEP which return the value of the corresponding data for a particular hydrogeologic unit.
Added new function GetValueFromLayer that allows a 2D data set to retrieve a value from a specific layer of a 3D data set.
When writing the reservoir layer, ModelMuse now checks for invalid layer numbers and layers that are beneath non-simulated layers.

ModelMuse now creates a file named "usgs.model.reference." for the groundwater flow model. Previously, the "model" part of the file name would be the name of the model. A file with the model name as part of the file name is still created. "Usgs.model.reference" is used for model archives. If multiple models are in the same directory, the duplicate with the "model" replaced by the name of the model can be used to create a new copy of "usgs.model.reference" for the desired model.
File extension for the Reservoir package input file change from ".res" to ".resv" to avoid conflict with a PEST output file.
When reading pathline, endpoint, or time-series files from MODPATH 7, ModelMuse will skip lines that contain NaN instead of numbers and displays an error message.
ModelMuse now creates backups of several files such as the RunModel file for use in tests of ModelMuse.
Changed the formula for the initial head in MODFLOW models to Model_Top.
ModelMuse no longer includes RCH, EVT, or ETS among the point sources in MT3D-USGS in non MODFLOW 6 models.
If no MODFLOW stress periods are defined when the user attempts to generate the MODFLOW input files, one will now be created automatically.
It is no longer possible to define two parameters with the same name in the Manage Parameters dialog box.
Fixed bug that could cause an access violation when drawing contours with a MODFLOW DISV model.
In some cases where a circular reference error would have resulted in a bug report, a message to the user will be displayed instead.
Fixed bug in importing specific storage from the BCF package when importing an existing MODFLOW-2005 or MODFLOW-NWT model.
Fixed a bug that could cause a range-check error when drawing contours if the cross section does not intersect the mesh.
Fixed a bug that could cause a bug report to be generated when opening an existing model.
Fixed defining CSUB observations for csub, inelastic-csub, elastic-csub, sk, ske, interbed-compaction, inelastic-compaction, elastic-compaction, and thickness observation types.
Fixed import of the MODFLOW-2005 lake package in models with only one layer.
Fixed the ^ operator so that it will accept two real-number arguments.
Fixed bug in the Manage Head Observations dialog box when the user clicked the Highlight Selected Object button without first selecting any objects in the table.
ModelMuse now creates UCN file in MT3D-USGS for the sorbed phase when the sorbtion choice is linear.
ModelMuse no longer generates a bug report if the user specifies more than one contour value for a boolean data set.
When writing real number array values, real numbers close to zero will be written as zero if they require more precision than is provided by a single precision real number.
Fixed bug that could cause an assertion failure when accessing vertex values.
Fixed bug that could cause access violations when evaluating the RCH or ETS packages after disabling MODFLOW 6 observations.
When drawing a fishnet mesh, it is no longer possible to add the same node to a fishnet mesh element twice.
Fixed bug that could cause range check error if exporting an image of a 2D data set and restoring the image settings from the saved settings.
Fixed a bug so that in MODLFOW 6 lakes the lake bottom elevation is never too low and the lake top elevation is never too high in horizontal lake connections.
ModelMuse can now display vectors for MODFLOW 6 models in the Export Image dialog box.
Fixed bug that would cause an error when importing data in the Import Points dialog box if the decimal separator was not a period.
When attempting to read or save a global variables file, ModelMuse will now show an error message to the user instead of issuing a bug report if there is an error reading the file.
Fixed a bug that could cause ModelMuse to encounter an error when evaluating the IDOMAIN data set in MODFLOW 6 models.
When importing UZF data from shapefiles in models in which the UZT package is active, UZT will also be imported.
Fixed bug that could cause WellFootprint models to fail when exporting withdrawals.
Fixed bug that could cause a range check error when deleting an item in the SWR Range Geometry dialog box.
If the user attempts to edit CSUB data for an object without first defining any interbeds, ModelMuse will display a warning message for the user instead of generating a bug report.
Fixed a bug that prevented the functions for identifying the highest active layer from working with DISV MODFLOW 6 models.
Fixed a bug that could cause access violations if a formula started with a comma.
Fixed a bug that could cause access violations when shutting down ModelMuse.
When moving vertices of an object to the location of a vertex in another object, there could be a slight error in the location to which the vertex was moved. This has been corrected.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation when opening a model if the model that is already open had contours displayed or a data set used to color the grid or mesh.
Fixed a bug that could cause an error when exporting SUTRA model if no time schedule has been defined.
Fixed import of multiple ASCII grid files simultaneously.
Fixed bug in export of Shapefile mesh data from SUTRA 2D models that could cause a range check error.
Fixed a bug in the Errors and Warnings dialog box that could cause an Invalid class typecast error when right clicking in the dialog box.
Fixed bug that could cause an assertion failure when working with the Object Properties dialog box.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation in the SUTRA Time Controls dialog box.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation in the Manage Parameters dialog box.
Fixed a bug with renaming MODFLOW parameters when the only change was a change in the capitalization of the parameter name.
Fixed a bug that caused an access violation when pasting data from one model to another.
Fixed setting default exaggeration with SUTRA 2D models.
Fixed a bug in exporting the Basic Package input file in models that contain nonsimulated layers.
Fixed export of MAW package when flowing wells were used.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation in the Export Image dialog box if the user attempts to generate a side view image of a MODFLOW 6 DISV model.
Fixed bug in export of MAW package input that could cause MODFLOW 6 to stop with an error message for inactive wells.
If an SWR Reach boundary did not define data for some stress periods, ModelMuse now defines inactive reaches for those stress periods.
Fixed bug in drawing contours that could cause a range check error.
If there is an out of memory error when drawing the 3D view, the 3D view will be hidden until ModelMuse is restarted.
Fixed a bug pasting objects from the clipboard when the clipboard can not be accessed.
Fixed a bug that could cause an error when exporting data to a CSV file.
When importing data from a file, ModelMuse now only allows you to specify files that actually exist.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation when exporting the ETS package if EVT depth or rate fractions have not been assigned.
In the Geo Reference dialog box, the model start date now displays the format for dates used in the computer in which the starting date is being edited.
Fixed a bug that caused panning the model or resizing the main form to be unnecessarily slow.
Fixed bug that would cause a bug report to be generated if the Used item of a SUTRA boundary condition did not evaluate to true or false. Now an error message is displayed.
In MODFLOW 6 models, including lines for the RCH or EVT packages in the MODFLOW Name File dialog box will now prevent ModelMuse from exporting the input files for those packages.
Fixed bug in coloring the grid with a data set in a MODFLOW-LGR model that could cause a circular reference error.
Fixed bug that could cause MODFLOW 6 observation files to be misnamed if the model file name had a period within the base as well as one separating the base from the extension.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation when closing a MODFLOW LGR model.
Fixed a bug in the "File|Import|Grid Data Files" dialog box in which the "Open files" button did not work unless more than one file was selected.
Fixed bug in exporting the UZF input in MODFLOW 6 that caused the convergence history file to be misnamed.
Fixed bug in implementation of the K22OVERK and K33OVERK options in the NPF package.
Fixed a bug that could cause some cells to be incorrectly selected two or more times by the same object when the object selects both enclosed and intersected cells.
Fixed a bug that prevented MT3D concentration results from being imported.
Fixed bug in deleting Subsidence-related interbeds.
Fixed a bug that could cause an access violation if the name of a global variable that was used in a model feature was changed.
Fixed bug moving the first vertex of a closed object section.
Fixed bug that could cause an assertion failure when writing the UZF file in MODFLOW 6.
Fixed bug that would cause an access violation if the UZF package in MODFLOW-2005 was converted to the UZF package in MODFLOW 6 and the model was exported without saving and closing the model first.
Fixed bug that could cause a range check error if an object defining a stream in the MODFLOW 6 SFR package did not intersect any cells.
Fixed check for connectivity in DISV grids in MODFLOW 6.
Fixed bug with exporting MVR package.
Fixed bug in importing Shapefiles if unnamed CSV attributes are included.
Fixed reading TProgs binary data files containing byte-sized integer data.
Fixed a bug that could cause an exception to be raised in models with large grids.
ModelMuse will now correct the data type, orientation, and where the data set is evaluated for any required data set if those values are incorrect.
ModelMuse will no longer attempt to export MNWI model input files in MODFLOW 6 models.
Fixed display of MODPATH output in MODFLOW DISV models in which the cross section angle is not zero.
Fixed bug in resetting velocity vectors to not used.
Fixed bug that could cause MODFLOW stress period starting and ending times to be saved with small rounding errors.
Fixed bug in displaying contour values.
Fixed renaming of data sets associated with MODFLOW parameters when the parameters are renamed.
Fixed a bug in exporting SUTRA time schedules for BCS files in which the time steps were one greater than they should have been.
Fixed a bug importing SUTRA BCOF, BCOP, BCOS, and BCOU files in which inactive boundaries were not handled correctly.
Fixed a bug that could cause errors when exporting files if object names were not unique.
Fixed a bug that could cause ModelMuse to enter an infinite loop when using triangle interpolation.
If a MODFLOW 6 Lake outlet has no transient data assigned, ModelMuse now issues an error message instead of failing.
Fixed bug that would cause MODFLOW 6 MVR receivers to sometimes not be found if the receiver was a lake.
Fixed assigning values to nodes or elements in SUTRA and cells in MODFLOW 6 DISV models when both intersected and enclosed items are to be assigned values when there are two elevation formulas.
Fixed saving CREFT in SUTRA models.
Fixed a bug where the LakeID was not set properly.
Fixed the ability to define recharge solute flux observations in MT3D.
Attempting to insert a new layer group when more than one layer group is selected no longer causes an access violation.
Changing the layer size multiplier in the MODFLOW Layer Groups dialog box now causes DISV grids to be updated correctly.
Fixed the display of a warning message while exporting Shapefiles.
Fixed export of Zonebudget files for archive.
Fixed bug that could cause the lake package in MODFLOW 6 to be created incorrectly if the lake only had vertical connections.
Fixed the Import Gridded Data dialog box so that it no longer automatically changes the number of ignored values to 1 when a data set is selected.
The specify Contours dialog box no longer allows the users to attempt to set the number of contours to a value less than 1.
Fixed bug that could cause extra LPF or HUF parameters to be generated when switching among parameter types in the MODFLOW Packages and Programs dialog box.
Fixed a bug that could cause an assertion failures when importing shapefiles data from CSV files, if one or more columns did not have column headers.
Fixed export of SFT when no SFT boundaries are defined.
Fixed export of SFT package in MT3D-USGS when there is more than one chemical species.
Fixed a bug that caused an access violation if the InterpolatedVertexValues function was used without an argument.
Fixed display of XT3D data in the Grid or Mesh Values dialog box.
When saving the MODFLOW Name file, the Byte Order Mark should no longer be written.
Fixed bug that could cause an error when merging objects.
Fixed bug that could cause incorrect values to be exported when exporting contours to Shapefiles.
Fixed export of SSM in MT3D-USGS when the DRT package is used.
Fixed evaluation of node outlines in the front view of 3D SUTRA models.
Fixed bug that resulted in an invalid SUTRA fishnet mesh when the "increase backwards" option was used.
Fixed bug that could result in Assertion failures when creating BCS files.
Fixed bug that resulted in an invalid SUTRA fishnet mesh when the "increase forward" option was used.
Fixed export of MT3D-USGS lake transport package for models with more than one chemical species.
